name: obsidian-link-embed
description: This plugin auto-fetches page metadata to embed Notion-style link preview cards.

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.copyBuild: make-dir build && rimraf build/main.js build/manifest.json build/styles.css && cpy main.js manifest.json styles.css build/
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run copyBuild
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run version && npm run copyBuild

author: SErAphLi
